meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Scrophulariaceae.
meanings.sent1: The gerardias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many botanists study gerardias to learn about different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The gerardias in the park had a secret meeting at midnight.
meanings.sent4: Her love for gerardias was as deep as the roots of the plants.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the gerardias brightened up the entire field.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'gerardia', referring to multiple plants in the genus Gerardia.
meanings.sent1: We planted gerardias in our backyard to create a beautiful garden.
meanings.sent2: The gerardias in the greenhouse were thriving under proper care.
meanings.sent3: The gerardias at the botanical garden threw a party for all the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: The field was a sea of gerardias, a colorful carpet under the sun.
meanings.sent5: Children loved picking gerardias and making colorful bouquets for their parents.
